title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.13 - Actuarial basis
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.13 - Actuarial basis

State Regulations
A basis compatible with principles followed by actuaries; said of computations involving compound interest, retirement and mortality
estimates, and the like. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
